title: Recyclable LaF3·Pd nanocatalyst in Suzuki coupling: green synthesis of biaryls from haloarenes and phenylboronic acids
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,21269-21276
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00686K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Smitabala Panda, Sagarika Patra, Swadhin Swaraj Acharya, Ganngam Phaomei, Bibhuti Bhusan Parida
A green and sustainable approach has been developed using a recyclable and reusable LaF3·Pd nanocatalyst. This catalyst has been applied in the synthesis of biaryls in good to excellent yields via Suzuki coupling in aqueous medium.
